sentences.en: A lass that has many wooers often fares the worst.
sentences.cn: 追求者多的少女往往钟情于最糟糕的家伙.

sentences.en: Alice worked on the farm as a lass.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯曾在农场当女工.

sentences.en: Anne is a Lancashire lass from Longton, near Preston.
sentences.cn: 安妮是兰开夏郡姑娘，老家在普雷斯顿附近的朗顿。

sentences.en: But Little , thinking little of Short, loved a little lass named Long.
sentences.cn: 但利特儿很少想着肖特, 他爱上了小姑娘朗.

sentences.en: Don't be hard on the bonny lass.
sentences.cn: 别对这个漂亮的小姑娘这么凶吧.

sentences.en: For thee lass I'll see your song and raise you happiness tenfold!
sentences.cn: 为了这些姑娘我将会听到你的歌曲,并把你的幸福提高十倍!

sentences.en: He was playing the fool with that lass.
I am no shepherd lass, though I have helped with the sheep like anyone else.
sentences.cn: 我不是什么牧羊丫头, 虽然我也象别人一样照看过羊群.

sentences.en: It's a muddle, lass; everything is a muddle.
sentences.cn: 这是一团糟, 亲爱的. 什么都是一团糟.

sentences.en: K - Grapcefulness and Sequential features of two lass graph were given.
sentences.cn: 给出了两类图的k - 优美性和序列性.

sentences.en: Kind : Lass mich noch ein bisschen l? nger schlafen, Mama.
sentences.cn: 别吵我, 妈妈. 让我再睡一会儿.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, let us not be moved by the rough side of a shepherd lass's tongue.
sentences.cn: 在此同时, 请大家不要因为这个牧羊丫头出言不逊而动肝火.

sentences.en: Nay,' said the servant, `don't be hard on the bonny lass, Mrs Dean.
sentences.cn: “别，”那女仆说，“丁太太，对这个漂亮的小姑娘别这么凶吧。

sentences.en: The dainty lass is his sister.
sentences.cn: 那位俊俏的小姑娘是他妹妹.

sentences.en: There was no sign of the lass in your cabin afore we shoved off.
sentences.cn: 在开船前你的船舱里看不见她的影子.

trans.tran_cn: 小女孩，少女，情人，（苏格兰）女佣
